title: The Founder of the Cape Epic Thinks His New 7-Day Gravel Stage Race Could Be Even Bigger
content:
Kevin Vermaak says that Gravel Burn, which debuts October 2025, "has a realistic shot at being bigger and better than the Cape Epic."

Read the full article at The Founder of the Cape Epic Thinks His New 7-Day Gravel Stage Race Could Be Even Bigger on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
